00100 template <class ParameterInterace>
00101 void TParamsPtr<ParameterInterace>::Init(const IParamsSet* parameterSetPtr, const QByteArray& parameterId, bool I_IF_DEBUG(isObligatory))
00102 {
00103        if ((parameterSetPtr != NULL) && !parameterId.isEmpty()){
00104               BaseClass::SetPtr(dynamic_cast<const ParameterInterace*>(parameterSetPtr->GetParameter(parameterId)));
00105 
00106               I_IF_DEBUG(
00107                      if (!BaseClass::IsValid() && isObligatory){
00108                             iprm::IParamsSet::Ids existingParamIds = parameterSetPtr->GetParamIds();
00109                             QStringList existingIds;
00110                             for (iprm::IParamsSet::Ids::ConstIterator index = existingParamIds.constBegin(); index != existingParamIds.constEnd(); index++){
00111                                    existingIds.push_back(*index);
00112                             }
00113 
00114                             QString idList = existingIds.join(", ");
00115                             QString debugMessage = QString("Parameter %1 was not found in the parameter set. Following parameter IDs are registered: %2").arg(QString(parameterId)).arg(idList);
00116 
00117                             qDebug(debugMessage.toLocal8Bit().constData());
00118                      }
00119               )
00120        }
00121        else{
00122               BaseClass::Reset();
00123        }
00124 }
00125 
00126 
00127 template <class ParameterInterace>
00128 void TParamsPtr<ParameterInterace>::Init(
00129                      const IParamsSet* parameterSetPtr,
00130                      const icomp::TAttributeMember<icomp::CIdAttribute>& parameterIdAttribute,
00131                      const icomp::TReferenceMember<ParameterInterace>& defaultRef,
00132                      bool isObligatory)
00133 {
00134        BaseClass::Reset();
00135 
00136        if (parameterSetPtr != NULL){
00137               if (parameterIdAttribute.IsValid()){
00138                      BaseClass::SetPtr(dynamic_cast<const ParameterInterace*>(parameterSetPtr->GetParameter(*parameterIdAttribute)));
00139               }
00140 
00141               if (!BaseClass::IsValid() && defaultRef.IsValid()){
00142                      BaseClass::SetPtr(defaultRef.GetPtr());
00143               }
00144 
00145               I_IF_DEBUG(
00146                      if (!BaseClass::IsValid() && isObligatory){
00147                             iprm::IParamsSet::Ids existingParamIds = parameterSetPtr->GetParamIds();
00148                             QStringList existingIds;
00149                             for (iprm::IParamsSet::Ids::ConstIterator index = existingParamIds.constBegin(); index != existingParamIds.constEnd(); index++){
00150                                    existingIds.push_back(*index);
00151                             }
00152 
00153                             QString idList = existingIds.join(", ");
00154                             QString debugMessage = QString("Parameter %1 was not found in the parameter set and no default parameter is active. Following parameter IDs are registered: %2").arg(QString(parameterId)).arg(idList);
00155 
00156                             qDebug(debugMessage.toLocal8Bit().constData());
00157                      }
00158               )
00159        }
00160 }
